Datarista | Providence, RI | Full time | ONSITE

Datarista is building a PaaS platform to reinvent how third-party sales and marketing data providers deliver data to their customers. The Datarista platform provides data providers with integration services for adding and enhancing accounts, contacts and leads within cloud based CRM and Marketing Automation platforms.

We have positions open for back end, front end, and data engineer positions. Check us out at http://www.datarista.com/hiring or email jobs@datarista.com
